entries.name: figma implement design
entries.description: This skill provides a structured workflow for translating Figma designs into production-ready code with pixel-perfect accuracy.

entries.name: Implement
entries.description: Guides an agent through implementing a feature with tests and validation.

entries.name: figma
entries.description: Use the Figma MCP server for Figma-driven implementation. For setup and debugging details (env vars, config, verification), see references/figma-mcp-config.md.

entries.name: develop web game
entries.description: Build games in small steps and validate every change. Treat each iteration as: implement → act → pause → observe → adjust.

entries.name: rust async patterns
entries.description: Production patterns for async Rust programming with Tokio runtime, including tasks, channels, streams, and error handling.

entries.name: rust cli builder
entries.description: Plan and build production-ready Rust CLI tools using clap for argument parsing, with subcommands, config file support, colored output, and proper error handling.

entries.name: python expert
entries.description: Senior Python developer expertise for writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code.

entries.name: python testing
entries.description: Python testing strategies using pytest, TDD methodology, fixtures, mocking, parametrization, and coverage requirements.

entries.name: k8s manifest generator
entries.description: Create production-ready Kubernetes manifests for Deployments, Services, ConfigMaps, and Secrets following best practices and security standards.

entries.name: k8s security policies
entries.description: Implement Kubernetes security policies including NetworkPolicy, PodSecurityPolicy, and RBAC for production-grade security.

entries.name: kubernetes architect
entries.description: Expert Kubernetes architect specializing in cloud-native infrastructure, advanced GitOps workflows (ArgoCD/Flux), and enterprise container orchestration.

entries.name: devops iac engineer
entries.description: Implements infrastructure as code using Terraform, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms. Designs scalable architectures, CI/CD pipelines, and observability solutions.

entries.name: helm chart scaffolding
entries.description: Design, organize, and manage Helm charts for templating and packaging Kubernetes applications with reusable configurations.
